page.title: 10CURRIE HOUSEWIFE
page.content: Mrs B lives in Lanark Road with her husband. They have lived there for 61 years. They have three children but they have all left home. Mrs B enjoys gardening and her hobbies are sewing and baking, but she dislikes household cleaning. Mrs B shops at a supermarket and local shops because they are easy to get to and she has got to know the shopkeepers. She buys meat, rolls and bread in these shops, but most of her vegetables are home grown. If it is a nice sunny day she and her husband like to go for a walk or take a ride in the car. If she was not at this interview she would be washing dishes and cleaning the kitchen.
